ComicInfo.Summary:
Where Brothers-in-Arms ends, FIRE FROM HEAVEN begins! Deathblows visit to Dr. Tsung erupts in chaos when One-Eyed Jack and his Bounty Hunters get to Tsung first! Featuring Sigma and The Sword!
Story continued from Sigma (1996) #1.
Story continues in Fire from Heaven 1

ComicInfo.Title: Choosing Up
